title: Talking About Sex With a Sexually Abused Child
description:
In today’s show, we talk with a mom hoping to learn how to appropriately talk about sex with her sexually traumatized child, and a newlywed wondering if it’s okay that he doesn’t want any friends aside from his wife. Then, Dr. John breaks down gaslighting scenes in the Disney classic Tangled.

Some Parts are NOT for Sharing – Julie K. Federico

Lyrics of the Day: "Irreplaceable" - Beyonce

Let us know what’s going on by leaving a voicemail at 844.693.3291 or visiting johndelony.com/show.
